verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֬רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach of Korah מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH4905> mas-Kil. Maschil אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him O God בְּאָזְנֵ֬ינוּ <WH241> be-'a-ze-Nei-nu with our ears שָׁמַ֗עְנוּ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-nu, We have heard אֲבוֹתֵ֥ינוּ <WH1> a-vo-Tei-nu our fathers סִפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> sip-pe-ru- have told לָ֑נוּ La-nu; פֹּ֥עַל <WH6467> Po-'al us [what] work פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <WH6466> pa-'Al-ta thou didst בִֽ֝ימֵיהֶ֗ם <WH3117> vi-mei-Hem, in their days בִּ֣ימֵי <WH3117> Bi-mei in the times קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> Ke-dem. of old

אַתָּ֤ה׀ <WH859> 'at-Tah your own יָדְךָ֡ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha with thy hand גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> go-Yim the heathen ה֭וֹרַשְׁתָּ <WH3423> Ho-rash-ta [How] thou didst drive out וַתִּטָּעֵ֑ם <WH5193> vat-tit-ta-'Em; and plantedst תָּרַ֥ע <WH7489> ta-Ra' them [how] thou didst afflict לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים <WH3816> le-'um-Mim, the people וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃ <WH7971> Vat-te-shal-le-Chem. and cast them out

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֪א <WH3808> lo not בְחַרְבָּ֡ם <WH2719> ve-char-Bam by their own sword יָ֥רְשׁוּ <WH3423> Ya-re-shu in possession אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz, not the land וּזְרוֹעָם֮ <WH2220> u-ze-ro-'Am neither did their own arm לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not הוֹשִׁ֪יעָ֫ה <WH3467> ho-Shi-'Ah save לָּ֥מוֹ la-mo כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- But יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> ye-mi-ne-Cha them but thy right hand וּ֭זְרוֹעֲךָ <WH2220> U-ze-ro-'a-cha and thine arm וְא֥וֹר <WH216> ve-'or and the light פָּנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha, of thy countenance כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for רְצִיתָֽם׃ <WH7521> re-tzi-Tam. because thou hadst a favour

אַתָּה־ <WH859> 'at-tah- you ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu You מַלְכִּ֣י <WH4428> mal-Ki Thou art my King אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; O God צַ֝וֵּ֗ה <WH6680> tzav-Veh, command יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <WH3444> ye-shu-'ot deliverances יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. for Jacob

בְּ֭ךָ Be-cha צָרֵ֣ינוּ <WH6862> tza-Rei-nu our enemies נְנַגֵּ֑חַ <WH5055> ne-nag-Ge-ach; Through thee will we push down בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ <WH8034> be-shim-cha, through thy name נָב֥וּס <WH947> na-Vus will we tread them under קָמֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6965> ka-Mei-nu. that rise up

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor בְקַשְׁתִּ֣י <WH7198> ve-kash-Ti in my bow אֶבְטָ֑ח <WH982> 'ev-Tach; For I will not trust וְ֝חַרְבִּ֗י <WH2719> ve-char-Bi, neither shall my sword לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor תוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <WH3467> to-shi-'E-ni. save

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for ה֭וֹשַׁעְתָּנוּ <WH3467> Hoo-sha'-ta-nu But thou hast saved מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ <WH6862> mitz-tza-Rei-nu; us from our enemies וּמְשַׂנְאֵ֥ינוּ <WH8130> u-me-san-'Ei-nu that hated הֱבִישֽׁוֹתָ׃ <WH954> he-vi-Sho-ta. and hast put them to shame

בֵּֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> Be-lo-him In God הִלַּלְ֣נוּ <WH1984> hil-laL-nu we boast כָל־ <WH3605> chol all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; all the day וְשִׁמְךָ֓׀ <WH8034> ve-shim-Cha thy name לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever נוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> no-Deh long and praise סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אַף־ <WH637> 'af- But זָ֭נַחְתָּ <WH2186> Za-nach-ta thou hast cast off וַתַּכְלִימֵ֑נוּ <WH3637> vat-tach-li-Me-nu; and put us to shame וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not תֵ֝צֵ֗א <WH3318> te-Tze, and goest not forth בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6635> be-tziv-'o-Tei-nu. with our armies

תְּשִׁיבֵ֣נוּ <WH7725> te-shi-Ve-nu Thou makest us to turn אָ֭חוֹר <WH268> 'A-chor back מִנִּי־ <WH4480> min-ni- from צָ֑ר <WH6862> Tzar; from the enemy וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֵ֗ינוּ <WH8130> u-me-san-'Ei-nu, and they which hate שָׁ֣סוּ <WH8154> Sha-su us spoil לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

תִּ֭תְּנֵנוּ <WH5414> Tit-te-ne-nu Thou hast given כְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> ke-Tzon us like sheep מַאֲכָ֑ל <WH3978> ma-'a-Chal; [appointed] for meat וּ֝בַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> u-vag-go-Yim, us among the heathen זֵרִיתָֽנוּ׃ <WH2219> ze-ri-Ta-nu. and hast scattered

תִּמְכֹּֽר־ <WH4376> tim-kor- Thou sellest עַמְּךָ֥ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha thy people בְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- for ה֑וֹן <WH1952> Hon; for nought וְלֹ֥א־ <WH3808> ve-Lo- not רִ֝בִּ֗יתָ <WH7235> rib-Bi-ta, and dost not increase בִּמְחִירֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4242> bim-chi-rei-Hem. [thy wealth] by their price

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <WH7760> te-si-Me-nu Thou makest חֶ֭רְפָּה <WH2781> Cher-pah us a reproach לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <WH7934> lish-che-Nei-nu; to our neighbours לַ֥עַג <WH3933> La-'ag a scorn וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס <WH7047> va-Ke-les, and a derision לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5439> lis-vi-vo-Tei-nu. to them that are round about

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <WH7760> te-si-Me-nu Thou makest מָ֭שָׁל <WH4912> Ma-shol us a byword בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim; among the heathen מְנֽוֹד־ <WH4493> me-nod- a shaking רֹ֝֗אשׁ <WH7218> Rosh, of the head בַּל־ <WH3816> bal- among the people אֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> 'um-Mim. the peoples

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הַ֭יּוֹם <WH3117> Hai-yom [is] continually כְּלִמָּתִ֣י <WH3639> ke-lim-ma-Ti My confusion נֶגְדִּ֑י <WH5048> neg-Di; is before וּבֹ֖שֶׁת <WH1322> u-Vo-shet before me and the shame פָּנַ֣י <WH6440> pa-Nai of my face כִּסָּֽתְנִי׃ <WH3680> kis-Sa-te-ni. hath covered

מִ֭קּוֹל <WH6963> Mik-kol For the voice מְחָרֵ֣ף <WH2778> me-cha-Ref of him that reproacheth וּמְגַדֵּ֑ף <WH1442> u-me-gad-Def; and blasphemeth מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei by reason א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <WH341> o-Yev, of the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <WH5358> u-mit-nak-Kem. and avenger

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All זֹ֣את <WH2063> zot likewise בָּ֭אַתְנוּ <WH935> Ba-'at-nu All this is come וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not שְׁכַחֲנ֑וּךָ <WH7911> she-cha-cha-Nu-cha; upon us yet have we not forgotten וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo-Shi- have not שִׁ֝קַּ֗רְנוּ <WH8266> Kar-nu, thee neither have we dealt falsely בִּבְרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1285> biv-ri-Te-cha. in thy covenant

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- has not נָס֣וֹג <WH5472> na-Sog is not turned אָח֣וֹר <WH268> a-Chor back לִבֵּ֑נוּ <WH3820> lib-Be-nu; Our heart וַתֵּ֥ט <WH5186> vat-Tet declined אֲשֻׁרֵ֗ינוּ <WH838> 'a-shu-Rei-nu, neither have our steps מִנִּ֥י <WH4480> min-Ni from אָרְחֶֽךָ׃ <WH734> 'a-re-Che-cha. from thy way

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki Yet דִ֭כִּיתָנוּ <WH1794> Dik-ki-ta-nu Though thou hast sore broken בִּמְק֣וֹם <WH4725> bim-Kom us in the place תַּנִּ֑ים <WH8577> tan-Nim; of dragons וַתְּכַ֖ס <WH3680> vat-te-Chas and covered עָלֵ֣ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu with בְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <WH6757> ve-tzal-Ma-vet. us with the shadow of death

אִם־ <WH518> 'i-mo-Sha- If שָׁ֭כַחְנוּ <WH7911> chach-nu If we have forgotten שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem the name אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; of our God וַנִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <WH6566> van-nif-Ros or stretched out כַּ֝פֵּ֗ינוּ <WH3709> kap-Pei-nu, our hands לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> le-'El god זָֽר׃ <WH2114> Zar. to a strange

הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> ha-Lo not אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him Shall not God יַֽחֲקָר־ <WH2713> ya-cha-kor- search this out זֹ֑את <WH2063> Zot; likewise כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu He יֹ֝דֵ֗עַ <WH3045> yo-De-a', ;for he knoweth תַּעֲלֻמ֥וֹת <WH8587> ta-'a-lu-Mot the secrets לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> Lev. of the heart

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עָ֭לֶיךָ <WH5921> 'A-lei-cha your sake הֹרַ֣גְנוּ <WH2026> ho-Rag-nu Yea for thy sake are we killed כָל־ <WH3605> chol all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom; all the day נֶ֝חְשַׁ֗בְנוּ <WH2803> nech-Shav-nu, long we are counted כְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> ke-Tzon as sheep טִבְחָֽה׃ <WH2878> tiv-Chah. for the slaughter

ע֤וּרָה׀ <WH5782> 'U-rah Awake לָ֖מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah why תִישַׁ֥ן׀ <WH3462> ti-Shan why sleepest אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; the Lord הָ֝קִ֗יצָה <WH6974> ha-Ki-tzah, arise אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּזְנַ֥ח <WH2186> tiz-Nach cast [us] not off לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach. for ever

לָֽמָּה־ <WH4100> lam-mah- Why פָנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> fa-Nei-cha thou thy face תַסְתִּ֑יר <WH5641> tas-Tir; Wherefore hidest תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <WH7911> tish-Kach [and] forgettest עָנְיֵ֣נוּ <WH6040> 'a-ne-Ye-nu our affliction וְֽלַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3906> Ve-la-cha-Tze-nu. affliction

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for שָׁ֣חָה <WH7743> Sha-chah is bowed down לֶעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> le-'a-Far to the dust נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <WH5315> naf-She-nu; For our soul דָּבְקָ֖ה <WH1692> da-ve-Kah cleaveth לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> la-'A-retz unto the earth בִּטְנֵֽנוּ׃ <WH990> bit-Ne-nu. our belly

ק֭וּמָֽה <WH6965> Ku-mah Arise עֶזְרָ֣תָה <WH5833> 'ez-Ra-tah for our help לָּ֑נוּ La-nu; וּ֝פְדֵ֗נוּ <WH6299> u-fe-De-nu, and redeem לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an the sake חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> chas-De-cha. us for thy mercies'
